active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs between Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) for data at rest and Always Encrypted for column-level protection. Consider factors like performance overhead, key management complexity, application changes required, and compliance with OWASP A02:2021 Cryptographic Failures. Support arguments with real-world breach examples like Equifax.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Database Encryption Implementation (Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Software Development Security > Secure Coding Guidelines and Standards > 012_Data Protection and Privacy > Data Storage Security > Database Encryption Implementation). Use the provided Learning Objectives (Bloom's Taxonomy), Active Learning activities, Scaffolding Layers (4 progressive), and Flashcard Schema to generate high-quality, optimized flashcards. Incorporate: - Voter consensus (87.1% approval): Explicit Bloom's objectives (e.g., define TDE, compare TDE vs Always Encrypted, critique NIST SP 800-57), 4 layers, prior knowledge links, key management best practices (AES-256, rotation), standards (NIST SP 800-57 full, FIPS 140-3, PCI-DSS, GDPR), pitfalls, big picture (OWASP A02:2021, Equifax breach). - Research context: Core concepts (encryption, TDE=automatic file encryption e.g. Oracle, Always Encrypted=client-side, symmetric/asymmetric, keys, data at rest/transit). Generate 75 flashcards following the exact Flashcard Schema: Varied question types, distractor protocol, full back-side elements. Categorize by Scaffolding Layer and tag Bloom's level. Ensure university pedagogy: Scaffolded progression, active recall, misconceptions addressed. Output ONLY a JSON array: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'distractors_analysis': '...', 'references': '...', 'active_learning_link': '...'}, 'layer': '1', 'blooms_level': 'Remember'}, ...]. No additional text.
